info.question: Which of the following storage mechanisms can be used to store messages effectively which also can be used across distributed systems?

Which of the following features is normally present in all of AWS Support Plans?
answers: Access to all features in the Trusted Advisor

info.question: You are planning to serve a web application on the AWS platform by using EC2 instances. Which of the below principles would you adopt to ensure that even if some of the EC2 instances crash, you still have a working system?
Which of the following options would entice a company to use AWS over an on-premise data center?
answers: Having access to Free and Unlimited Storage
Having access to Unlimited Physical Servers
Ability to use resources on demand
correctAnswer: Ability to use resources on demand

info.question: Which AWS service has built-in DDoS mitigation?

The Dev team is currently using 2 reserved instances. The QA team is planning on using 3 instances of the same instance type. What is the pricing tier of the instances that can be used by the QA team?
Which of the following are right principles when designing cloud based systems?
answers: Use as many services as possible

answers: It's a collection of edge locations
It's a collection of compute capacity
It's a geographical area divided into Availability Zones
It's the same as an Availability Zone
correctAnswer: It's a geographical area divided into Availability Zones

info.question: In AWS, which security aspects are the customer's responsibility?
answers: Security Group and ACL (Access Control List) settings
Patch management on the EC2 instance's operating system
Controlling physical access to compute resources
Encryption of EBS (Elastic Block Store) volumes
correctAnswer: Security Group and ACL (Access Control List) settings
Patch management on the EC2 instance's operating system
Encryption of EBS (Elastic Block Store) volumes

info.question: Which of the following can be used to manage identities in AWS?
Which of the following is a best practice when working with permissions in AWS?
answers: Ensure the least privilege access is used
Don't use IAM users and groups
Ensure the highest privilege access is used
correctAnswer: Ensure the least privilege access is used

A company wants to use AWS storage. For them, low storage cost is paramont, the data is rarely retrieved, and data retrieval times of several hours are acceptable. What is the best storage option to use?
answers: EBS backed storage connected to EC2

info.question: What are characteristics of Amazon S3?
answers: S3 allows you to store objects of virtually unlimited size
S3 allows you to store unlimited amounts of data
S3 should be used to host a relational database
Objects are directly accessible via a URL
correctAnswer: S3 allows you to store unlimited amounts of data
Objects are directly accessible via a URL

When using on-demand instances in AWS, which of the following is a false statement when it comes to the costing for the instance?
answers: You pay no upfront costs for the instance
You are charged per second based on the hourly rate
You have to pay the termination fees if you terminate the instance
You pay for as much as you use
correctAnswer: You have to pay the termination fees if you terminate the instance

info.question: AWS provides a storage option known as Glacier. What is this service designed for?

What is the key difference between an availability zone and an edge location?
answers: An availability zone is a grouping of AWS resources in a specific region; an edge location is a specific resource within the AWS region
An availability zone is an Amazon resource within an AWS region, whereas an edge location will deliver cached content to the closest location to reduce latency
Edge locations are used as control stations for AWS resources
correctAnswer: An availability zone is an Amazon resource within an AWS region, whereas an edge location will deliver cached content to the closest location to reduce latency

answers: Costs are automatically reduced for multiple accounts by AWS

correctAnswer: You can resize the capacity accordingly

answers: MySQL installed on two Amazon EC2 instances in a single availability zone
